descriptionHtml:
[CENTER][SIZE=7][COLOR=#ff0000][FONT=Franklin Gothic Medium]Runic Sword[/FONT][/COLOR][/SIZE][COLOR=#0070c0][FONT=Arial Narrow][SIZE=5] by Standalone09[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][/CENTER]

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Feature:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

[youtube]b-mu5niTiPo[/youtube]
video by Gruntlock  thanks dude!

[CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR=#e5e0ec][URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/44259//?]My other Epic Mod![/URL][/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]

[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Description:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

So here i share with you guys my custom 1h the \\\"Runic Sword\\\".
The Sword is availabe under the Ebony Category at the forge.
It has a really nice \"glowing\" dragon on the scabbard.

Stats:

Base DMG: 12
Weight: 13 
Reach: 1.000(Standart for Swords)
Speed: 1.000(Standart for Swords)

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Install:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Extract the archive
2.Copy the contents of the archive in your Skyrim\\\\Data folder
3.Open the Skyrim launcher or your mod manager of choice and check the Runic.esp 

[FONT=Garamond][SIZE=5][COLOR=#938953]Uninstall:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]

1.Uncheck the esp plugin
2.Delete all files that came with the mod

[CENTER][IMG]http://holybibletext.com/divider.png[/IMG][/CENTER]

Do NOT modify/reupload/edit/sell any asset in this mod without my permission. Have fun!
author: standalone09
